amendment.description: An amendment No. 27 printed in part B of House Report 114-25 to amend 20 U.S.C. 7703 to increase weight of non-connected children residing in public-private venture (PPV) housing located on military property for the purposes of Impact Aid basic support payment calculations.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Courtney amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Courtney.
